Constructed from durable, waterproof materials, this portable tent provides shelter from unexpected showers and keeps you comfortable throughout the year. Its easy-to-fold design allows for compact storage and effortless transportation, making it ideal for frequent campers and adventurers.

This versatile outdoor camping car side tent is designed to maximize your enjoyment of your caravan or motorhome. It seamlessly attaches to popular awning brands like Fiamma and Dometic, creating a spacious shaded area for relaxing or dining outdoors.

  • Waterproof Construction: The tent features durable waterproof material to keep you dry and comfortable even in unexpected showers.
  • Portable Folding Design:
  • Easily set up and take down for convenient transport and storage. It folds compactly, making it ideal for campers who value space efficiency.
  • Projection Screen Capability:
  • Transform your awning into a home theater by utilizing the tent's built-in projection screen feature. Enjoy movie nights under the stars!

The side tent is constructed from high-quality materials to ensure durability and longevity.

Its dimensions are carefully designed to fit seamlessly with standard Fiamma and Dometic awnings, providing a customized fit for your vehicle.

This innovative camping accessory offers numerous benefits for outdoor enthusiasts:

  • Increased Living Space: Expand your living area and enjoy more comfortable space when relaxing or entertaining outdoors.
  • Protection from the Elements: The waterproof construction provides shelter from rain, sun, and wind, ensuring a pleasant camping experience regardless of the weather.
  • Versatile Entertainment Options:
  • The integrated projection screen allows for memorable movie nights under the stars, enhancing your camping entertainment options.

Setting up this car side tent is straightforward. Simply attach it to your existing Fiamma or Dometic awning and secure the tent poles for stability. The waterproof material will keep you dry, while the projection screen feature provides a fun way to enjoy movies outdoors.
